00001 #ifndef _Average_t_H_
00002 #define _Average_t_H_

00004 #include <iostream>
00005 #include <iomanip>
00006 // FLT_MAX
00007 //#include <values.h>
00008 #include <climits>
00009 #include <cfloat>
00010 #include <RtypesSubSet.h>
00011 #if ( __GNUC__ < 3 )
00012 #  include <math.h>
00013 #else
00014 #  include <cmath>
00015 #endif
00016 
00021 class Average_t {
00022 public:
00023   friend  std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &os, const Average_t &a) ;
00024 
00027   Average_t() : _weight(0.),
00028                 _min(FLT_MAX),
00029                 _max(-FLT_MAX),
00030                 _sum(0.),
00031                 _sum2(0.) {};
00032 
00039   void add(Float_t value, Float_t weight=1.) {
00040     _weight+=weight; 
00041     _sum+=value*weight; 
00042     _sum2+=value*value*weight; 
00043     if (value<_min) _min=value; 
00044     if (value>_max) _max=value;
00045   };
00046 
00051   void calculate() {
00052     if (_weight>1) {
00053       Double_t mean=_sum/_weight;
00054       Double_t sigma=sqrt((_sum2-mean*_sum)/(_weight-1));
00055       _mean=mean;
00056       _sigma=sigma;
00057     }
00058   };
00059 
00063   Double_t mean() const {return _mean;};
00064 
00068   Double_t sigma() const {return _sigma;};
00069 
00072   Float_t min() const {return _min;};
00073 
00076   Float_t max() const {return _max;};
00077 
00080   Double_t weight() const {return _weight;};
00081   
00084   Double_t sum() const {return _sum;};
00085   
00086 protected:
00087   Double_t  _weight;
00088   Float_t _min;
00089   Float_t _max;
00090   union { 
00091     Double_t _sum;
00092     Double_t _mean;
00093   };
00094   union {
00095     Double_t _sum2;
00096     Double_t _sigma;
00097   };
00098 };
00099 
00100 inline std::ostream &operator <<(std::ostream &os, const Average_t &a) {
00101   os << std::setw(9) << a._weight << ":" 
00102      << std::setw(9) << a._min << " < " 
00103      << std::setw(9) << a._mean << "+-" 
00104      << std::setw(9) << a._sigma 
00105      << " < " << std::setw(9) << a._max
00106     ;
00107   return os;
00108 }
00109 
00110 #endif
